"""pylivemaker exceptions."""



[docs]class LiveMakerException(Exception):
    """Base pylivemaker exception."""




[docs]class BadLiveMakerArchive(LiveMakerException):
    """Error raised for bad/invalid archive files."""




[docs]class UnsupportedLiveMakerVersion(LiveMakerException):
    pass




[docs]class UnsupportedLiveMakerCompression(LiveMakerException):
    pass




[docs]class BadLsbError(LiveMakerException):
    """Error raised for bad/invalid LSB script files."""




[docs]class BadLpbError(LiveMakerException):
    """Error raised for bad/invalid LPB project settings files."""




[docs]class BadLnsError(LiveMakerException):
    """Error raised for bad/invalid LNS novel scripts."""




[docs]class InvalidCharError(BadLnsError):
    def __init__(self, ch, encoding="cp932"):
        self.ch = ch
        self.encoding = encoding
        super().__init__(f"'{ch}' is not a valid {encoding.upper()} character.")




[docs]class BadTextIdentifierError(LiveMakerException):
    """Error raised for bad/invalid translatable text IDs."""
